Posts.Content: Hi Lester17 Is I am between 2 & 3 of FEC I d be happy to help reassure you if I  can Ihelp ? x
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I have my treatments on a monday afternoon and after the 1st one I found I didn't do much the 1st weel to be honest< I think I was waiting for all the side effect that we are told about ...I was given anti sickness tablets to take and had no nausea at all. also that 1st treatment I was so affraid I was going to get an infection so I was worried about mixing with people ..and tended to isolate myself from everyone other than immediate family living in the home  I found after my 2nd treatment I wasn't so worried..I break my weeks down my 1st week I take it as it comes as I might be tired than usual etc ....2nd week be aware of immune system being low but last week being my 2nd week I did go out to do a bit of shopping etc ...3rd week usually a good week :) I feel good, I am not working because I work with children  and the risk of infection, I also felt at the beginning that I would be writing of 6 months, but I am finding that as long as I m sensible and don t put myself under any risk of catching infections I am able to do what I want really :) x It
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: have you been given any anti sickness tablets ? I have had 2 treatments now and not experienced any nausea and sickness...I know this isn't always the case for people but when I told my consultant I was pleased about this at my check up he said that is why we give you the anti sickness.. we  don t want you to be sick with it.... have you been given a nurse to contact ?
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: I have a tablets one of which I take an hour before treatments starts and for 2 days after called Amend plus I have others that i take for 2 days after treatment. too ...it might be worth asking the question before you go ? ......yes I know what you mean...for me I was feeling quite well and the thought of sitting there letting them put these drugs in me that might make me sick etc was what I found difficult. x
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi Lynne  You are in the position I was a few months ago, please don t be scared x  I am between treatments 2 and 3 of FEC and will be having Radiotherapy afterwards... After having my lump removed and being told it was non agressive and not spread the hope was just to have radiotherapy, when my test came back saying chemo was recommended I was devastated. For a couple of reasons.(I don t mind expanding on this)  But I m doing well and at least with the test I know I'm doing this for good reason other than because that's what we do ! Please ask anything and if I can help I will  xx
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hope you are feeling better now Jinty and have a comfortable night xx
Posts.Title: *** December Chemo Club ***

Posts.Content: Hi Fiona  when I had my 1st I was worried but it wasn't has bad as I thought.  Share your worries and see if we can help xx
